name: Universal Disk Format File
summary: Learn about .UDF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The UDF standard is developed and maintained by the Optical Storage Technology Association (OSTA).

NOTE: Even though the UDF format is commonly used, the ".udf" extension is not. Instead, disc burning applications typically save images in their own formats and then burn them using the UDF standard.

description: File created in the Universal Disk Format (UDF), a disc imaging format used for storing files on optical media; stores a collection of files using the directory structure specified in the UDF standard; can be used for burning DVDs, CDs, and other optical media; allows files to be deleted and modified on the target disc even after they have been written.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .udf file in UYAP Doküman Editörü 5
images.caption: UDF file open in UYAP Doküman Editörü 5
